shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus "Miracles of Jesus" (fols. 4ra-126vb) I-1) ʾƎsäggǝd lä-mäläkotǝkä ... "I worship Thy Godhead ..." (fols. 2ra-3va, 1ra-vb) I-2) Introduction (fols. 4ra-9vb) - On John the Evangelist as the author of the book; on the creation and the fall of the angels (fols. 4ra-6va) - Story of the family of Adam (fols. 6va-9vb) I-3) Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus "Miracles of Jesus": 44 miracles (fols. 10ra-126vb)

donors.donor: The names of Gäbrä Krǝstos, Wälättä Mädḫǝn and Wälättä Giyorgis are written in Text I-1 and have been added to the supplication formulas in a different hand (probably hand b). These names are also listed on fol. 129v.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; secondary textile cover. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 7 tools were used: double line fillet, triple line fillet, double circle, x-from, cross hatching, double sine wave, triple sine wave).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

squires.squire: <A(3; s.l.: 1, stub after 3/fols. 1r-3v)> – I(8/fols. 4r-11v) – ፪II(8/fols. 12r-19v) – ፫III(8/fols. 20r-27v) – ፬IV(8/fols. 28r-35v) – ፭V(8/fols. 36r-43v) – ፮VI(8/fols. 44r-51v) – ፯VII(8/fols. 52r-59v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 60r-67v) – ፱IX(8/fols. 68r-75v) – ፲X(8/fols. 76r-83v) – ፲፩XI(8/fols. 84r-91v) – ፲፪XII(8/fols. 92r-99v) – ፲፫XIII(8/fols. 100r-107v) – ፲፬XIV(8/fols. 108r-115v) – ፲፭XV(8/fols. 116r-123v) – ፲፮XVI(6; s.l.: 2, stub after 5; 5, stub after 2/fols. 124r-129v).

taunit.rl-info:
Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. Structural pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The scribe did not use the bottom ruled line on fols. 14v, 17r-v.

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: poor. Hand b: mediocre.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a: fols. 2ra-3va (Text I-1). The script is hasty and poorly executed, with left-sloping letters. Hand b: fols. 4ra-126vb (Texts I-2 and 1-3). The handwriting is characterized by a rounded and very broad script with distinctive features: - many letters have hairlines, esp. at the top (e.g., ለ, ረ, ሰ, ት, ዕ) - መ and ሠ in all vowel orders are often set on the baseline - ይ and ደ are sometimes difficult to distinguish - ል has a long top end, very small inner loop. The hand is similar to that of AMQ-019.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; groups of lines on the incipit page; incipit of sections and subsections; word ʾǝsäggǝd in Text I-1; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements. The names of the donors, mentioned throughout the Ms., have been added later in a secondary hand in a different tone of red.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fol. 34rb) ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ (e.g., fols. 24ra, 62vb, 96ra) ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fol. 22vb)

otherdetails.otherdetail: The miracles are numbered with the exception of the 11th and 12th miracle (so that the miracle numbered as 11 is actually the 13th miracle and so on).

extras.extra: - An omitted passage of Text I-1 is added on fol. 1vb; -- Lacunae (words/names are missing): fols. 4va, 6va, 18ra, 79va. - Unfilled spaces left for rubricated names of the donor(s): e.g., fols. 93vb, 107rb. - Corrections written over erasures: e.g., fols. 19ra, 40va, 77va, 96ra, 101va, 118vb, 121va. - An omitted passage has been written in the upper margin: fol. 48rb. - In the sections of the 34th and the 41st miracle the abbreviation ምዕ for the word mǝʿǝraf "chapter" is added in a secondary hand with marks in the midst of the text columns showing the beginnings: fols. 75r, 80v, 11r. - Titles of miracles (or a part of it) or feasts indicating respective readings are written in the upper margin, probably in hand b: fol. 8rb: ዘአዳም፡ ወሔዋን፡ (introduction) fol. 10ra: ዘእግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ (1st miracle) fol. 11va: ዘልደት፡ (2nd miracle) fol. 13ra: ዘሰሎሜ፡ (3rd miracle) fol. 17rb: ዘበዐለ፡ ስምዖን፡ (5th miracle) fol. 18ra: ዘሰብአ፡ ሰገል፡ (6th miracle) fol. 20rb: ዘከመ፡ ተሰደ፡ ውስተ፡ ቍስቋም፡ (7th miracle) fol. 22rb: ዘጥጥምና፡ (8th miracle) fol. 24ra: ዘኬዎስ፡ (10th miracle) fol. 43va: በእንተ፡ ሕፃናት፡ (24th miracle) fol. 56rb: ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት፡ (31st miracle) fol. 58va: ዘጥምቀት፡ (32nd miracle) fol. 62vb: ቃና፡ ዘገሊላ፡ (33rd miracle) fol. 64rb: ዘዓልዛር[sic]፡ (34th miracle) fol. 76vb: ዘጻድቃን፡ (34th miracle) fol. 91rb: ዘሆሣዕና፡ (35th miracle) fol. 94ra: ዕለተ፡ ፍሥሕ፡ (36th miracle) fol. 96ra: ሕጽበት፡ (37th miracle) fol. 99va: ዘነግህ፡ (38th miracle) fol. 101va: ዘ፫ሰዐት፡ (38th miracle) fol. 103vb: ዘ፮ሰዓት፡ (38th miracle) fol. 105rb: ዘ፱ሰዓት፡ (38th miracle) fol. 105vb: ዘቀዳሜ፡ ሥዑር፡ (39th miracle) fol. 107ra: ዘትንሣኤ፡ (40th miracle) fol. 107ra: ዘዮሴፍ፡ (41st miracle) fol. 118ra: ዘሰንበት፡ (42nd miracle) fol. 119va: ዘ፲ወ፪ወ፸አርድእት፡ (43rd miracle) fol. 120vb: ዘዕርገት፡ (44th miracle). - Further indications to the miracles are written in recent hands, in pen: fols. 6v, 16v, 53r, 61v, 66v, 70v, 73r, 81v, 83v, 85v, 88v, 108v, 11r, 112v, 119v, 123v. - Scribbles: fol. 126vb.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: Quire marks for quires II-XVI are written in the left upper margin.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Names of the days of the week are written in the upper margin of fol. 2ra-3va.
